tasks.title: Implement Core Layout and Navigation
tasks.description: Complete website layout, navigation, and basic UI components
tasks.details: âœ… COMPLETED: Homepage with hero section implemented. Navigation bar with user menu working. Footer component complete. Theme toggle functionality working. All basic layout components are in place.
tasks.testStrategy: All navigation flows tested, responsive design verified

tasks.title: Implement Authentication UI
tasks.description: User registration, login, and authentication interfaces
tasks.details: âœ… COMPLETED: Registration form implemented and working. Login page created and functional. Wallet authentication UI implemented. User authentication context and hooks working. Registration successfully creates users and redirects to login.
tasks.testStrategy: All authentication flows tested including wallet integration

tasks.title: Implement Property Display and Management
tasks.description: Property listing, search, and management interfaces
tasks.details: âœ… COMPLETED: Property listing display working. Property detail pages implemented. Featured properties component functional. Property grid and card components complete. Recent commits show property page implementation.
tasks.testStrategy: Property browsing and viewing functionality verified

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Search page with filters, sorting, and map integration
tasks.details: âœ… COMPLETED: Search page implemented with filters, sorting, and search params. Filter sidebar functional. Map integration completed with mobile responsiveness. Search synchronization with URL parameters working. Property search with location autocomplete functional.
tasks.testStrategy: Search functionality tested with various filters and map integration

tasks.title: Implement Booking Interface
tasks.description: Booking form, confirmation pages, and booking management
tasks.details: âœ… COMPLETED: Basic booking form implemented. Booking confirmation page created. Booking details display functional. Booking confirmation components working. Integration with backend booking API in place.

tasks.title: Complete Freighter Wallet Integration
tasks.description: Full Stellar wallet integration for USDC payments
tasks.details: ðŸ”„ IN PROGRESS: Wallet authentication partially implemented. WalletAuthButton component exists. Need to complete: USDC balance display, payment transaction flow, transaction status tracking, and payment confirmation UI.

subtasks.title: Implement USDC Balance Display
subtasks.description: Show user's USDC balance in wallet interface
subtasks.details: Add balance fetching and display in wallet components

subtasks.title: Complete Payment Transaction Flow
subtasks.description: Implement complete USDC payment flow for bookings
subtasks.details: Transaction building, signing, submission, and confirmation

tasks.title: Implement User Dashboard
tasks.description: User profile management and dashboard interfaces
tasks.details: ðŸ”„ IN PROGRESS: Basic tenant dashboard exists. Host dashboard partially implemented. Need to complete: profile management interface, booking history, property management for hosts, and user preferences.

tasks.title: Implement Property Listing Creation
tasks.description: Host interface for creating and managing property listings
tasks.details: Property listing form exists but needs completion. Need to implement: image upload interface, availability calendar, pricing management, and property status updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Property creation and management fully functional

tasks.title: Enhance User Experience and Polish
tasks.description: Loading states, error handling, and UX improvements
tasks.details: Basic error handling exists. Need to add: comprehensive loading states, better error messages, success notifications, form validation improvements, and accessibility enhancements.
tasks.testStrategy: All user interactions provide clear feedback

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Features
tasks.description: Reviews, messaging, and advanced booking features
tasks.details: Advanced features not yet implemented. Need: review and rating system UI, user messaging interface, advanced booking options, property recommendations, and social features.

metadata.description: Frontend tasks synchronized with current repository state - July 2024
